mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drones.BIDS (AMOUNT, CURRENCY, COMMENT, PROJECT_ID, USER_ID) VALUES ( #{amount}, #{currency}, #{comment}, #{projectId}, #{user.id} )
mapper.sql:
SELECT B.ID AS BID_ID, B.AMOUNT AS BID_AMOUNT, B.CURRENCY AS BID_CURRENCY, B.COMMENT AS BID_COMMENT, B.PROJECT_ID AS BID_PROJECT_ID, B.USER_ID AS BID_USER_ID, B.MODIFIED_AT AS BID_MODIFIED_AT, B.CREATED_AT AS BID_CREATED_AT,
U.ID AS USER_ID, U.USERNAME AS USER_USERNAME, U.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL, U.FIRST_NAME AS USER_FIRST_NAME, U.LAST_NAME AS USER_LAST_NAME, U.PHOTO_URL AS USER_PHOTO_URL, U.INTRODUCTION AS USER_INTRODUCTION, U.SUMMARY AS USER_SUMMARY, U.RATING AS USER_RATING, U.MODIFIED_AT AS USER_MODIFIED_AT, U.CREATED_AT AS USER_CREATED_AT FROM drones.BIDS B LEFT JOIN drones.USERS U ON U.ID = B.USER_ID
mapper.select: SELECT B.PROJECT_ID AS BID_PROJECT_ID, ANY_VALUE(B.CURRENCY) AS BID_CURRENCY, COUNT(B.ID) AS BID_COUNT, AVG(B.AMOUNT) AS BID_AVG, MAX(B.AMOUNT) AS BID_MAX FROM drones.BIDS B WHERE B.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}
mapper.update: UPDATE drones.BIDS SET AMOUNT = #{amount}, CURRENCY = #{currency}, COMMENT = #{comment} WHERE ID = #{id}
